headline: Is the Stock Market Open Today? Here Are the Trading Hours for Good Friday.
summary: Good Friday is here, and it’s time for Wall Street to catch its breath.  All U.S. stock exchanges observe Good Friday, meaning the New York Stock Exchange and the  Nasdaq Stock Market  will both be closed.  This means the Cboe Futures Exchange and CME Globex trading platform will be closed on April 18.
